name: intgr-teoco.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: "nttm-intgr-teoco"
  jmx:
    enabled: false
nttm:
  prefixUrl: "http://127.0.0.1"
  auth:
    username: "netrac"
    password: "123456"
  url:
    prefix: "/#/tickets/editticket;id="
    # type=2, сетевой тикет
    prefixTicketType: ";type=2"
  netrac:
    # source sistem id for "NetracTeoco" is 6
    sourceSystemName: "NetracTeoco"
    sourceSystemId: 6
    timeout: 10

    # responsibility side id for "ПАО Ростелеком" is 4
    responsibilitySideName: "ПАО Ростелеком"
    responsibilitySideId: 4

    # curator name is  "Netrac Teoco"
    curatorName: "Netrac Teoco"

    # curator group name "Мониторинг соответствующей технологии СПК"
    curatorGroupName: "Мониторинг соответствующей технологии СПК"

    # network type id for "Сеть пакетной коммутации" is  8
    networkTypeId: 8

    status:
      equip-add: 3
    tasks:
      types:
        registrationTaskTypeId: 15
        diagTaskTypeId: 16
        checkTaskTypeId: 26
        autoConfirmationTaskTypeId: 53
        autoCloseTaskTypeId: 27
      codes:
        autoCloseCodesId:  255
        autoCloseCheckCodesId: 267
      statuses:
        closeStatusId: 1
        queueStatusId: 2
        workStatusId: 3
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
